title: Modern JavaScript
description: If you're new to JavaScript and want to master it completely then look no further than this 20-hr JavaScript master class.In this course you'll learn JavaScript from the ground up, using modern techniques and workflows. You'll build a weather app, a chat room, an interactive quix and a UI library, all from scratch.Your JavaScript journey starts here...

videos.name: Modern JavaScript Tutorial #1 - Intro & Setup
Modern JavaScript Tutorial #2 - Syntax Basics & Types
Modern JavaScript Tutorial #3 - Control Flow
Modern JavaScript Tutorial #4 - Functions
Modern JavaScript Tutorial #5 - Objects
Modern JavaScript Tutorial #6 - The Document Object Model

title: Flutter Course
description: Flutter is a mobile UI framework developed by Google, used to make native mobile apps. To create Flutter apps we use a language called Dart, also developed by Google.In this Flutter course, you'll learn the basics of Dart, from the ground up, and develop a Flutter app from scratch. I'll also show you how to preview your apps on an android emulator.

videos.name: Flutter Course - Full Tutorial for Beginners (Build iOS and Android Apps)

title: Strapi Crash Course (with React & GraphQL)
description: Strapi is what's known as a headless CMS, meaning it's like a traditional CMS but without the front-end templates. It gives us total control as to how we'd like to make the front-end.In this course you'll learn how to use Strapi from the ground up & implement it into a React application. You'll also learn how to use GraphQL to query Strapi data from the React application.

videos.name: Strapi Crash Course (with React & GraphQL) #1 - Intro & Setup
Strapi Crash Course (with React & GraphQL) #2 - Create a Strapi App
Strapi Crash Course (with React & GraphQL) #3 - Content Types & Endpoints

Strapi Crash Course (with React & GraphQL) #5 - Creating a React App

Strapi Crash Course (with React & GraphQL) #7 - Fetching a Single Record

Strapi Crash Course (with React & GraphQL) #11 - Query Variables
Strapi Crash Course (with React & GraphQL) #12 - Relational Data
Strapi Crash Course (with React & GraphQL) #13 - Fetching Related Data
Strapi Crash Course (with React & GraphQL) #14 - Rich Text Content

title: Learn Go (Golang)
description: Go is a general purpose programming language which can be used for many things - to create REST API's, cloud services & build web apps. It's fast, it's fun & it's relatvely easy to pick up and run with.In this Go tutorial you'll learn how to install Go & use all the basic features & types. You'll also use your new found skills to reate a small command line application to create and save cafe bills

videos.name: Golang Tutorial #1 - An Introduction to Go Programming

title: Mobile-First Responsive Build
description: Hey gang, in this mini-series, we'll build a responsive website using a mobile-first approach (developing the site for mobiles first and then extending the design to larger screens) with CSS grid.

title: Node.js Auth (using JWT)
description: In this Node.js authentication course, you'll learn how to authenticate requests to your server using JWT's (JSON web tokens). I'll show you how to protect data and guard web pages from users who are not authenticated, how to hash passwords, store user information in a database & how to create web tokens for logged-in users.

title: Bulma CSS Page Build Tutorial
description: Bulma CSS is a component-based CSS framework not too dissimilar to Bootstrap. It includes a grid system, helper classes for things like colours & fonts & a few ready-made components like buttons, navbars & tabs.In this Bulma page build tutorial you'll build a product page from scratch, which implements these classes & components.

title: Vue 3 Animations Tutorial
description: Learn how to add subtle animations & transitions to your Vue components to make your website look slicker & generally better thought out. In this series you'll learn about the Vue Transition component, transition groups, stagger effects & GSAP.

title: Object Oriented PHP Crash Course
description: Learn about objects in PHP & how to program in an object oriented way - using classes, constructors, access modifiers, inheritance & more. You'll also put all these things together to build a form validation class you can reuse in your own projects.If you know the basics of PHP and want to take it further, this is the course.

videos.name: mockup tomado de pagina net ninja

title: Data Visualization with D3.js & Firebase
description: Learn how to make great-looking, interactive & fun data visualizations such as line graphs, bar charts, pie charts, tree diagrams & more, with D3.js. You'll also learn how to hook your visualizations up to a real-time database (Firebase Firestore), so that your graphs & charts update in real-time.

videos.name: mockup tomado de pagina net ninja
